definition: The term refers to the ability or capacity to exert control, influence, or authority over others. It is commonly used to describe the power or might possessed by individuals, groups, or institutions to achieve certain goals or enforce their will.

examples.german: Die Macht des Königs ist absolut.
examples.english: The power of the king is absolute.

examples.german: Er hat die Macht, Entscheidungen zu treffen.
examples.english: He has the power to make decisions.

examples.german: Die Macht der Natur ist beeindruckend.
examples.english: The power of nature is impressive.

examples.german: Sie übt ihre Macht über die anderen aus.
examples.english: She exercises her power over the others.

examples.german: Die politische Macht liegt beim Volk.
examples.english: The political power lies with the people.
